aka: Hyper Projection Play "Haikyuu!!" The Start of the Giant
this_title: ハイパープロジェクション演劇えんげき「ハイキュー!!」"はじまりの巨人
trans_title: Hyper Projection舞台剧“排球少年!!”开始的巨人
Hyper Projection Play "Haikyuu!!" The Start of the Giant
introduction: The fifth stage play adaption of Haruichi Furudate's Haikyū!! series. The stage play focused on Hinata and Kageyama developing their new attack, as well as portraying the stories of other members on the Karasuno team. It covered Karasuno's matches against Johzenji and Wakutani South during the Spring Interhigh preliminaries.
